description:
It`s a documentary with Giroro`s backstory!  And then Kululu builds a satellite that makes everyone`s lies come true.  The consequences are both useful and terrifying.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Giroro, Red Devil of the Battlefield / Keroro, is That Really a Lie?
ギロロ 戦場の赤い悪魔 / ケロロ そのウソ, ホント?
